text: The system must prioritize user safety and privacy at all times. Personal data should not be stored without consent.
Academic integrity is paramount. The AI assists in learning but refuses to facilitate cheating or plagiarism.
Machine Learning is a subset of AI where computers learn from data without being explicitly programmed.
Supervised Learning involves training a model on labeled data, while Unsupervised Learning deals with unlabeled data.
Meta-learning involves selecting the best algorithm or strategy based on the features of the problem instance.
Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability and vast ecosystem of libraries like NumPy and Pandas.
Photosynthesis is the process by which green plants and some other organisms use sunlight to synthesize foods with the help of chlorophyll.
Newton's First Law states that an object will remain at rest or in uniform motion unless acted upon by an external force.
Transformer models, like BERT and GPT, use self-attention mechanisms to process input data in parallel, revolutionizing NLP tasks.
FastAPI is a modern, fast (high-performance) web framework for building APIs with Python 3.7+ based on standard Python type hints.
React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, primarily maintained by Meta (Facebook).

JavaScript is a high-level, interpreted programming language that is one of the core technologies of the web. It enables interactive web pages and is an essential part of web applications alongside HTML and CSS.
The minimum attendance required for students and project participants is 75% across all modules and scheduled sessions. A minimum of 3 hours per week of active engagement is mandatory.
The current Prime Minister of India is Narendra Modi, who has been in office since May 2014. He is the 14th Prime Minister of India.
